author: ‚ÄîElisabeth
message: We all have a quiet voice inside speaking the truth. Rey helped me hear that voice above all the other chatter and not only to follow it but to use meditatation and other habits to connect with it daily. If you care about people and nature,  it's easy to perceive the world as a depressing place. It's harder to make positive change. Rey is the kind of consistently caring ally we all need. He gives more encouragement than advice. love Rey's instagram post...especially the one about trusting the universe.  It helps to be able to trust a surfer philosopher coach for a couple of months, to learn to trust your own heart, and eventually the power of the waves to carry us where we need to go.
